entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
